title: Bug 7330: Make more actions available on text selection
description: I could not find the action 'Add Javadoc Comment' until I switched to the Outline view. Currently, the actions are distributed on a personal taste basis, which is not clear to users. It is not acceptable to force users to switch the view in order to access all the actions.
OB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action needs to be available in the context menu.
EB: The 'Add Javadoc Comment' action should be added to the context menu, so users can access it directly when selecting text.
SR: Ensure that all actions, including 'Add Javadoc Comment', can be accessed from the context menu or the Edit menu.
